banned.subject: Your account was banned!
banned.text: Dear %s! Your account was banned! We're sorry!
invite_employee.subject: Welcome to the family of employees!
invite_employee.text: Dear %s! You were invited to work as an employee on the website chvcm.ru. Use the password reset form to reset your password.
master.you_received_this_email_part1: You have received this email because you have registered on
master.you_received_this_email_part2: This email is a one-time notice and you do not need to respond to it.
password_reset.subject: Password reset!
password_reset.text: Dear %s! Use this code '%s' to reset your password!
password_reset_complete.subject: Password was reset!
signin.subject: You're logged in!
signin.text: Dear %s! You're logged in! If this is not you, contact support to block your account.
signin_tfa.subject: Attempting to login!
signin_tfa.text: Dear %s! You are trying to sign in! If this is not you, contact support to block your account.
signup.subject: You're sign up!
test.subject: Lorem Ipsum
test.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed quis convallis nisl. Praesent condimentum tellus nec orci aliquet fringilla. Aliquam aliquet lacinia interdum. Mauris vehicula leo ut justo pulvinar, ac pellentesque ipsum sagittis. Donec in enim nec ipsum posuere blandit. Suspendisse in tempus lacus, et egestas enim. Sed mollis interdum ornare. Nam pulvinar ipsum nec leo aliquam auctor. Vestibulum non quam id diam vulputate pharetra. Integer imperdiet imperdiet quam, at pellentesque arcu posuere fermentum. Donec tempor metus elit, ac mattis purus congue lacinia. Nam vel ante nunc.
tfa_email.subject: Two Factor Authentication!
tfa_email.text: Dear %s! Use this code '%s' to complete Two Factor Authentication!
unbanned.subject: Your account was unbanned!
unverified.subject: Your account is awaiting verification!
unverified.text: Your account details have been changed. Until the end of the check you can not participate in the auction. We apologize for any inconvenience.
verified.subject: Your account was verified!
